name: RUN N FIGHT
description:
RUN N FIGHT is a top-down maze game where you are trying to find your way through the mazes avoiding enemies until you find your weapon and take revenge! When you become powerful enough in later levels it turns into a zombie-style shooter.

You have four lives per stage, if you lose them all you move one stage backwards.

Destroy or get destroyed.

___

Operating Systems:

  • Windows 32 / 64
  • Linux 32 / 64
  • Mac 64

___

If you want to get in touch, report bugs, or know more about the game, you can find me @SteliosWinters

If you want to find out more about my other projects, check out - SteliosWinters.com

Music by Technoaxe

Thank you for visiting, and for those who enjoyed this page enough to buy it, I appreciate the support and I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed creating and testing it!
